sentences.sContent: You can make use of the building materials that have been lying by.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can make use of the building materials that have been lying by.
sentences.sCn: 你们可以利用那些被搁置不用的建筑材料。

sentences.sContent: This article provided some descriptions of the API, along with some sample code to illustrate how to make use of them.
sentences.sContent_eng: This article provided some descriptions of the API, along with some sample code to illustrate how to make use of them.
sentences.sCn: 这篇文章提供了应用程序编程接口的一些描述以及一些样本代码来阐明如何使用他们。

sentences.sContent: The generality of SOAP means that not all systems that make use of SOAP can communicate easily.
sentences.sContent_eng: The generality of SOAP means that not all systems that make use of SOAP can communicate easily.
sentences.sCn: SOAP 的一般性意味着并非所有使用 SOAP 的系统都可以很容易地进行通信。
